profile.name: Rohit Mahajan
profile.bio: Software Developer with expertise in building scalable backend systems, optimizing databases, and delivering clean, maintainable code.
about: I'm Rohit Mahajan, a Software Developer at Excellon Software Pvt. LTD, with a passion for creating impactful, high-performance solutions in both frontend and backend development. With expertise in React, .NET (C#), Laravel, Python, and Docker, I work on building robust, scalable applications and optimizing backend services for speed and reliability.

In my current role, I develop complex interfaces and optimize backend services, including rearchitecting APIs and integrating gRPC for faster, more efficient communication. I also support our DevOps infrastructure, managing CI/CD pipelines and multiple Azure servers to ensure smooth deployments. My recent work includes designing a React-based Document Management System (DMS) UI, Upgrading Windows app to .Net Core, and contributing to open-source projects like DBSyncKit.
• Full Stack Development: Frontend (React) and Backend (.NET, Laravel, Python)
I enjoy connecting with other developers and tech professionals, so feel free to reach out if you'd like to discuss development, best practices, or any new technologies!

competencies.title: System Architecture
competencies.description: Designing scalable, high-availability backend systems and microservices using .NET Core.

competencies.title: Database Optimization
competencies.description: Expertise in SQL Server tuning, complex query optimization, and efficient data modeling.

competencies.title: API Development
competencies.description: Building RESTful APIs and integrating third-party services with secure authentication patterns.

competencies.title: Clean Code Practices
competencies.description: Advocate for SOLID principles, design patterns, and maintainable codebase structures.

roles.title: Software Engineer
roles.description: Provided leadership and expertise in the role, collaborating with teams to deliver exceptional results and drive business objectives. Optimized backend services reducing latency by 20%.

roles.title: Software Developer
roles.description: Spearheaded the migration of legacy modules to modern frameworks. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration.

roles.title: Associate Software Developer
roles.description: Assisted senior developers in bug fixing and feature implementation. Gained deep understanding of the product lifecycle and deployment pipelines.

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering - BE, Computer Science

projects.title: DBSyncKit
projects.description: DBSyncKit is a powerful library for efficient and fast data synchronization operations across various database systems. Whether you're working with Microsoft SQL Server, MySQL, PostgreSQL, or SQLite, DBSyncKit provides a comprehensive suite of packages to streamline your synchronization tasks.

projects.title: SteamDetailz Car Wash Platform
projects.description: Location-based car wash service platform with authoritative backend system. Features ad-hoc booking management, real-time availability engine, per-vehicle yearly loyalty tiers, WhatsApp integration, and audit-grade admin controls. Built with .NET 10, PostgreSQL/PostGIS, clean architecture, and permission-based authorization.
